This project proposes to develop innovative methodologies for integrating Geographic Information Systems (GIS) with unstructured text analysis in the digital humanities. By developing a spatial humanities approach, we will open up new avenues for research, pedagogy, and knowledge creation in the humanities and beyond. Ultimately, this project will demonstrate the value of integrating GIS and digital humanities to transform our understanding of human cultures, societies, and environments.
